articles.title: Chipotle, Taco Bell, Moe’s have Burrito Day deals, free food Thursday, which also is National Beer Day - USA TODAY
articles.description: National Beer Day and National Burrito Day are both Thursday, April 7. Find deals on burritos, beer and more at restaurants nationwide.
articles.content:
